spec_data.Name: perl-Image-Xpm
spec_data.Description:
This class module provides basic load, manipulate and save functionality for
the xpm file format.  It inherits from Image::Base which provides additional
manipulation functionality.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:32:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Load, create, manipulate and save xpm image files in Perl
